summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 SATURN ION.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS STICKING AND MUST BE PULLED IN ORDER FOR IT TO LOOSEN.  THE PEDAL MADE A POPPING SOUND WHEN THIS OCCURRED.  TWO MONTHS AGO, THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR REPAIR AND THEY STATED THAT THE PEDAL WAS FAULTY.  CURRENTLY, THE PEDAL IS STICKING ONCE AGAIN AND THE CONTACT WILL CALL THE MANUFACTURER.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 19,650.
